verbose_text: Increased levels of sCD40L or sGPVI XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR in conjunction with a reduction of surface GPIba or GPVI, XREF_BIBR platelet derived chemokines XREF_BIBR and serotonin XREF_BIBR in platelet-free plasma, or of circulating platelet derived microparticles XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR and platelet-monocyte aggregates XREF_BIBR in whole blood have been reported in these patients.
